title: Navratna Polki Haaram - The Jewel of Auspicious Beginnings
features: This exquisite Haaram features nine traditionally auspicious Navratna gemstones, each meticulously carved and set in a Kundan setting with sparkling Polki diamonds. The unique design showcases rectangular gemstone pendants alternating with circular Polki diamond clusters, creating a harmonious blend of color and brilliance. The 'Guttiapusalu' style chain adds a touch of traditional Telugu design, completed with a secure and comfortable clasp.
occasions: Ideal for traditional Telugu occasions like weddings (Vivaham)
and other festive celebrations. This Haaram is also a stunning statement piece for high-end modern events and grand receptions.
description: This Navratna Haaram not only enhances your beauty but also carries immense cultural significance. Each of the nine gemstones represents a different planet and is believed to bring positive energy, prosperity, and protection. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and the intricate Kundan setting showcase exceptional craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and luster, making this a valuable heirloom piece.
